condition.description:
The urinary system is the body's drainage system for removing wastes and extra water. It includes two kidneys, two ureters, a bladder, and a urethra. Urinary tract infections (UTIs) are the second most common type of infection in the body.

You may have a UTI if you notice

  • Pain or burning when you urinate
  • Fever, tiredness or shakiness
  • An urge to urinate often
  • Pressure in your lower belly
  • Urine that smells bad or looks cloudy or reddish
  • Pain in your back or side below the ribs

People of any age or sex can get UTIs. But about four times as many women get UTIs as men. You're also at higher risk if you have diabetes, need a tube to drain your bladder, or have a spinal cord injury.

If you think you have a UTI it is important to see your doctor. Your doctor can tell if you have a UTI with a urine test. Treatment is with antibiotics.

NIH: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases
condition.name: Urinary tract infection
symptoms: Urine that smells bad or looks cloudy or reddish
Pain in your back or side below the ribs

carousel_items: Finish all of the medicine your doctor gives you, even if you start to feel better. Stopping it early can cause the bacteria to develop resistance, making the medicine ineffective.
If you're taking birth control pills, this medication may make them less effective.
Take with food to decrease upsetting your stomach (nausea, vomiting).
If you're giving the suspension, you can mix it with a cold drink, but make sure to take it right away.
Keep the suspension form in the fridge. All other forms should be kept at room temperature.
You may have loose stool when taking this medicine, but it should get better soon after finishing the course. If the diarrhea worsens, tell your doctor.

clock.tip: Doesn't work as quickly when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic. It kills bacteria and prevents them from reproducing and making their own protective covering.
basics.bottom_line: Amoxicillin is a good and cheap antibiotic to treat many types of bacterial infections. However, many bacteria are resistant to this medication.
downsides: Suspension must be stored in the fridge.
Can make birth control pills and live vaccines less effective.
Many bacteria have developed resistance to this antibiotic.

carousel_items_processed.orig: Finish all of the medicine your doctor gives you, even if you start to feel better. Stopping it early can cause the bacteria to develop resistance, making the medicine ineffective.
If you're taking birth control pills, this medication may make them less effective.
Take with food to decrease upsetting your stomach (nausea, vomiting).
If you're giving the suspension, you can mix it with a cold drink, but make sure to take it right away.
Keep the suspension form in the fridge. All other forms should be kept at room temperature.
You may have loose stool when taking this medicine, but it should get better soon after finishing the course. If the diarrhea worsens, tell your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea from a superinfection (an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection)
risks_warnings.description: Taking antibiotics, like Amoxicillin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: Taking antibiotics, like Amoxicillin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Severe allergic reaction
risks_warnings.description: If you have had an allergic reaction from taking penicillin-type antibiotics, such as trouble breathing or swelling in your face and neck, let your doctor know before taking this. Amoxicillin may not be right for you and your doctor can prescribe an alternate medicine.

description_processed.orig: If you have had an allergic reaction from taking penicillin-type antibiotics, such as trouble breathing or swelling in your face and neck, let your doctor know before taking this. Amoxicillin may not be right for you and your doctor can prescribe an alternate medicine.

risks_warnings.title: Decreased effectiveness of birth control pills
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Amoxicillin and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Amoxicillin.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Amoxicillin and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Amoxicillin.

risks_warnings.title: Decreased effectiveness of live vaccines
risks_warnings.description: If you need to get a live vaccine such as Zostavax (for shingles) or typhoid, talk to your doctor since taking Amoxicillin can make the live vaccine less effective.

description_processed.orig: If you need to get a live vaccine such as Zostavax (for shingles) or typhoid, talk to your doctor since taking Amoxicillin can make the live vaccine less effective.

basics.benefits_moa: Augmentin is a combination antibiotic. Amoxicillin kills bacteria and prevents them from reproducing and making their own protective covering. Clavulanate stops chemicals the bacteria make to resist antibiotics.
basics.bottom_line: Augmentin is good for treating many bacterial infections and is available as generic. However, it will make birth control pills less effective. It also has to be taken with food since it can cause an upset stomach.
downsides: If you're on birth control pills, you should use a barrier method (condoms, diaphragms) since Augmentin can make them less effective.
Should be taken with food since it can cause stomach upset.
If you have phenylketonuria (PKU), talk to your doctor to prescribe an alternative.

downsides_processed.orig: If you're on birth control pills, you should use a barrier method (condoms, diaphragms) since Augmentin can make them less effective.
Should be taken with food since it can cause stomach upset.
If you have phenylketonuria (PKU), talk to your doctor to prescribe an alternative.

upsides: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule, and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen in bacteria to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see which antibiotics will kill the bacteria causing your infection.

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take this medication exactly as your doctor tells you to.
Take each dose with a meal since it may cause an upset stomach.
If you are taking birth control pills, this can make it less effective.
Store the suspension in the refrigerator. All other forms can be kept at room temperature.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: If you have mononucleosis (mono), contact your doctor for alternatives. Taking Augmentin when you have mononucleosis can cause a rash.

description_processed.orig: If you have mononucleosis (mono), contact your doctor for alternatives. Taking Augmentin when you have mononucleosis can cause a rash.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea
risks_warnings.description: As with all antibiotics, Augmentin can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: As with all antibiotics, Augmentin can cause diarrhea. risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of liver damage that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor if you notice pain in your abdomen, loss of appetite, yellowing of your skin or eyes, or dark colored urine.

basics.benefits_moa: Bactrim is a combination antibiotic that contains sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. It kills bacteria by preventing them from making proteins and other chemicals that keep them alive.
basics.bottom_line: Bactrim is good for treating many bacterial infections and is available as a generic. However, you can be more likely to sunburn. Also, it can cause birth defects, so talk to your doctor if you're pregnant.
downsides: Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of liquids.
May cause birth defects.

basics.benefits_moa: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic. It kills bacteria by preventing them from reproducing and repairing themselves.
basics.bottom_line: Ciprofloxacin is a good and cheap antibiotic to treat many types of bacterial infections. However, you have to reduce your caffeine intake, and have to protect yourself from the sun.
downsides: Must be used with caution in people over 60 years of age, or who have had either an organ transplant or on long-term steroid use due to possible tendon rupture.
If you have caffeine while on Ciprofloxacin, you may noticed increased effects of the caffeine.
Ciprofloxacin can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Can't be used if you've ever had myasthenia gravis.

downsides_processed.orig: Must be used with caution in people over 60 years of age, or who have had either an organ transplant or on long-term steroid use due to possible tendon rupture.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea
risks_warnings.description: As with all antibiotics, Ciprofloxacin can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Nerve damage
risks_warnings.description: Talk to your doctor immediately if you start to feel burning, tingling, numbness, pain or you can't tolerate heat or cold. This could be a sign of nerve damage and it can happen as soon as you start taking the medication and may not go away if you stop it.

description_processed.orig: Talk to your doctor immediately if you start to feel burning, tingling, numbness, pain or you can't tolerate heat or cold. This could be a sign of nerve damage and it can happen as soon as you start taking the medication and may not go away if you stop it.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in mood
risks_warnings.description: If you notice changes in your mood such as depression, nervousness, or mood swings after you start taking Ciprofloxacin, talk to your doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: Doxycycline is a tetracycline antibiotic. It stops bacteria by preventing them from reproducing and repairing themselves.
basics.bottom_line: Doxycycline is good for treating many bacterial infections. It is also available as generic. However, it can make birth control pills less effective. You also have to protect yourself against sunburn.
downsides: Can't be used in pregnant women and children under 8 years old.
Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of water and food and you have to stay upright for 30 minutes afterwards to avoid stomach irritation.
Can make birth control less effective.

It was very expensive and made me extremely nauseous.
I've been taking it for a few months, but I've actually had more cystic acne than usual.  I don't know if it's from an uptick in stress or if the medication isn't working, so use at your own caution.

Felt better on it after a herxheimer reaction.  Finished 3 week course and lyme relapsed.  Doesn't treat the cystic form of lyme so it can come back once you stop.  Makes you sunburn easily.  Take probiotics such as kefir or greek yogurt.
Take the full course, even if you have side effects because the infection won't go away.

Can cause changes in taste, headaches and insomnia.

basics.benefits_moa: Levofloxacin is an antibiotic. It kills bacteria by preventing them from reproducing and repairing themselves.
basics.bottom_line: Levofloxacin is good for treating many bacterial infections and is available as generic. However, it can cause damage to your tendons, and make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
downsides: Must be used with caution in people over 60 years of age, or who have had either an organ transplant or on long-term steroid use due to possible tendon rupture.
Levofloxacin can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Can't be used if you've ever had myasthenia gravis.
You have to space out any medications with aluminum, magnesium or zinc by at least 2 hours.
Can cause changes in taste, headaches, and insomnia.

downsides_processed.orig: Must be used with caution in people over 60 years of age, or who have had either an organ transplant or on long-term steroid use due to possible tendon rupture.
Levofloxacin can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Can't be used if you've ever had myasthenia gravis.
You have to space out any medications with aluminum, magnesium or zinc by at least 2 hours.
Can cause changes in taste, headaches, and insomnia.

upsides: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule, and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen in bacteria to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see which antibiotics will kill the bacteria causing your infection.

upsides_processed.orig: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule, and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen in bacteria to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see which antibiotics will kill the bacteria causing your infection.

userStories.tip: It ruined multiple tendons in both my hands. I had to have the tendons surgically repaired. After that I developed tendon damage in both legs and my rotator cuff-but it totally cleared up my sinus infection!

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: I stopped taking this medicine after I started having pain in my achilles tendon. I was afraid my tendon would rupture and that I would never be comfortable running again. The pain lasted for a few weeks! Don't take it unless you have to!

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: Had to stop after 3 days. Serious side effects. Too strong for me!

Do not take this medication! It will mess up your joints/tendons and cause multiple other problems. There are several FB groups with 1000's of victims from being "Floxed".  Cipro causes same damage also! Do your Research before taking!!!
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

drugs.name: Levaquin

carousel_items_processed.orig: If you notice pain in your Achilles tendons, contact your doctor.
Wear sunscreen if you're going to be out in the sun.
Take the medication exactly how the doctor tells you to.
Take this medication with plenty of fluids.
Space out any medications containing aluminum, magnesium or zinc by at least 2 hours.
Can cause diarrhea, nausea or vomiting.
Can cause changes in taste, headaches and insomnia.

risks_warnings.title: Tendon rupture
risks_warnings.description: If you notice redness/inflammation, pain or swelling in your joints or muscles, especially in the Achilles tendon, contact your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: If you notice redness/inflammation, pain or swelling in your joints or muscles, especially in the Achilles tendon, contact your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of liver damage that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor if you notice pain in your abdomen, loss of appetite, yellowing of your skin or eyes, or dark colored urine.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of liver damage that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor if you notice pain in your abdomen, loss of appetite, yellowing of your skin or eyes, or dark colored urine.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: If you've had seizures, taking Levofloxacin can make you more likely to have them. Talk to your doctor about alternatives.

description_processed.orig: If you've had seizures, taking Levofloxacin can make you more likely to have them. Talk to your doctor about alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in mood
risks_warnings.description: If you notice changes in your mood such as depression, nervousness, or mood swings after you start taking Levofloxacin, talk to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: If you notice changes in your mood such as depression, nervousness, or mood swings after you start taking Levofloxacin, talk to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Nerve damage
risks_warnings.description: Talk to your doctor immediately if you start to feel burning, tingling, numbness, pain or you can't tolerate heat or cold. This could be a sign of nerve damage. It can happen as soon as you start taking the medication and may not go away if you stop it.

description_processed.orig: Talk to your doctor immediately if you start to feel burning, tingling, numbness, pain or you can't tolerate heat or cold. This could be a sign of nerve damage. It can happen as soon as you start taking the medication and may not go away if you stop it.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: People with diabetes may notice changes in their blood sugar while taking Levofloxacin. Talk to your doctor if you should check your blood sugar more often, and follow what they tell you if it gets too high or too low.

description_processed.orig: People with diabetes may notice changes in their blood sugar while taking Levofloxacin. Talk to your doctor if you should check your blood sugar more often, and follow what they tell you if it gets too high or too low.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Levofloxacin. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

description_processed.orig: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Levofloxacin. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea
risks_warnings.description: As with all antibiotics, Levofloxacin can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: As with all antibiotics, Levofloxacin can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

points.name: insomnia
points.hlt: disturbances in initiating and maintaining sleep

points.name: abdominal pain
points.hlt: gastrointestinal and abdominal pains (excl oral and throat)

points.name: vaginitis
points.hlt: vaginal and vulval infections and inflammations

carousel_items: Both men and women should use barrier methods of birth control while on Minocycline since it can cause birth defects and make birth control pills less effective.
Can make you dizzy, so be careful if you're getting up from lying down or sitting. Don't drive until you know how it affects you.
Can stain your teeth, tongue and gums, but this is temporary.
Take this exactly how your doctor or pharmacist tells you until it's all gone.
Don't eat any dairy products or take any vitamins within 2 hours of taking Minocycline because they can make the medication less effective.

basics.benefits_moa: Minocycline is a tetracycline antibiotic. It stops bacteria by preventing them from reproducing and repairing themselves.
basics.bottom_line: Minocycline is an effective way to treat certain skin infections, acne, and rosacea, but you'll need to use barrier methods of birth control since it can make birth control pills less effective and cause birth defects.
downsides: It can make birth control pills less effective, so people should use barrier methods of birth control like condoms or diaphragms while on Minocycline.
Can stain your teeth, mouth, and gums if you're using the tablets, or your skin if you're using the topical version, but this is temporary.

downsides_processed.orig: It can make birth control pills less effective, so people should use barrier methods of birth control like condoms or diaphragms while on Minocycline.
Can stain your teeth, mouth, and gums if you're using the tablets, or your skin if you're using the topical version, but this is temporary.

upsides: Clinical studies show it's effective against MRSA, a common skin infection, and it's commonly used to treat acne and rosacea.
Available as a generic, so it should be reasonably priced.
Minocycline is less likely to cause sunburn than other tetracycline antibiotics.
Bacteria are less likely to become resistant to Minocycline than other tetracycline antibiotics.

upsides_processed.orig: Clinical studies show it's effective against MRSA, a common skin infection, and it's commonly used to treat acne and rosacea.
Available as a generic, so it should be reasonably priced.
Minocycline is less likely to cause sunburn than other tetracycline antibiotics.
Bacteria are less likely to become resistant to Minocycline than other tetracycline antibiotics.

userStories.tip: For the generic brand there are restrictions on when you take the medication so pay attention to labels

drugs.name: Minocycline

labeled_indications.indication: Infections that can't be treated with penicillin medications

carousel_items_processed.orig: Both men and women should use barrier methods of birth control while on Minocycline since it can cause birth defects and make birth control pills less effective.
Can make you dizzy, so be careful if you're getting up from lying down or sitting. Don't drive until you know how it affects you.
Can stain your teeth, tongue and gums, but this is temporary.
Take this exactly how your doctor or pharmacist tells you until it's all gone.
Don't eat any dairy products or take any vitamins within 2 hours of taking Minocycline because they can make the medication less effective.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in teeth
risks_warnings.description: This medication can cause changes in the color and development of teeth in fetuses and in children younger than 8 years old. Your doctor will recommend alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: This medication can cause changes in the color and development of teeth in fetuses and in children younger than 8 years old. Your doctor will recommend alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Decreased effectiveness of birth control pills
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Minocycline and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Minocycline.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Minocycline and you're also on birth control pills, the birth control can become less effective. Consider using a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Minocycline.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea from a superinfection (an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection)
risks_warnings.description: Taking antibiotics, like Minocycline can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: Taking antibiotics, like Minocycline can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rashes that can require hospitalization or can serious injury. These have been rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with a fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rashes that can require hospitalization or can serious injury. These have been rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with a fever.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Minocycline and have to be out in the sun for an extended amount of time, put on sunblock on the exposed areas of skin. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and is at higher risk for sunburn.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Minocycline and have to be out in the sun for an extended amount of time, put on sunblock on the exposed areas of skin. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and is at higher risk for sunburn.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Minocycline may cause birth defects. Don't use Minocycline while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Minocycline may cause birth defects. Don't use Minocycline while pregnant. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

carousel_items: Take it with food (ideally breakfast and dinner) to prevent side effects and improve the drug's absorption.
Don't take it with antacids that contain magnesium.

It's common to feel better before you're supposed to stop taking Nitrofurantoin, but take it for the entire time your doctor prescribed it. Skipping doses or stopping early can lower the drug's effectiveness and increase the chance that the drug won't work as well next time.

basics.benefits_moa: Nitrofurantoin is an antibiotic. It's used to treat urinary tract infections by killing bacteria in the urine.
basics.bottom_line: Nitrofurantoin works best in young, otherwise healthy females. It shouldn't be used by children, the elderly, or people with kidney problems.
downsides: Shouldn't be used for a long period of time.
Can't be used in children under 12 years old.
Interacts with drugs like probenecid and sulfinpyrazone.
Can't be used if you have kidney problems or don't urinate often (the medication could build up and cause toxicity).

downsides_processed.orig: Shouldn't be used for a long period of time.
Can't be used in children under 12 years old.
Interacts with drugs like probenecid and sulfinpyrazone.
Can't be used if you have kidney problems or don't urinate often (the medication could build up and cause toxicity).

upsides: Nitrofurantoin works well to treat urinary tract infections.
Young and otherwise healthy females have the best results when taking Nitrofurantoin.
It's not too common, but you can get a test done that'll show if Nitrofurantoin will work for you.

upsides_processed.orig: Nitrofurantoin works well to treat urinary tract infections.
Young and otherwise healthy females have the best results when taking Nitrofurantoin.
It's not too common, but you can get a test done that'll show if Nitrofurantoin will work for you.

userStories.tip: They're not kidding when they say 'take with food', Eat half your meal, swallow the pill, then eat the rest.

drugs.name: Nitrofurantoin

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it with food (ideally breakfast and dinner) to prevent side effects and improve the drug's absorption.
Don't take it with antacids that contain magnesium.

It's common to feel better before you're supposed to stop taking Nitrofurantoin, but take it for the entire time your doctor prescribed it. Skipping doses or stopping early can lower the drug's effectiveness and increase the chance that the drug won't work as well next time.

risks_warnings.title: Birth defects
risks_warnings.description: Nitrofurantoin can cause blood cells to break up and die. So it can't be used in pregnant women at term (38-42 weeks gestation), during labor and delivery, or when the onset of labor is imminent. For the same reason, the drug is contraindicated in newborn babies under one month of age.

description_processed.orig: Nitrofurantoin can cause blood cells to break up and die. So it can't be used in pregnant women at term (38-42 weeks gestation), during labor and delivery, or when the onset of labor is imminent. For the same reason, the drug is contraindicated in newborn babies under one month of age.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney damage
risks_warnings.description: Nitrofurantoin can cause significant kidney problems. Don't take it if you haven't been urinating often enough or have a history of kidney problems.

description_processed.orig: Nitrofurantoin can cause significant kidney problems. Don't take it if you haven't been urinating often enough or have a history of kidney problems.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of liver damage in people taking Nitrofurantoin. Your doctor will do some blood tests to make sure you don't have liver damage before taking this medication. Call your doctor immediately if you have pain in your abdomen, yellowing of the skin or whites of the eyes, have dark urine, or light colored stool. All of these can be signs of changes to your liver.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of liver damage in people taking Nitrofurantoin. Your doctor will do some blood tests to make sure you don't have liver damage before taking this medication. Call your doctor immediately if you have pain in your abdomen, yellowing of the skin or whites of the eyes, have dark urine, or light colored stool. All of these can be signs of changes to your liver.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea from a superinfection
risks_warnings.description: Taking antibiotics, like Nitrofurantoin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. This is a superinfection, an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: Taking antibiotics, like Nitrofurantoin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. This is a superinfection, an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

carousel_items: You might feel better after a few doses, but you'll need to take all the medicine that was prescribed. Not taking all your medicine can cause the bacteria to get stronger and Tetracycline not to work when you need it again in the future.
It doesn't fight viral infections, so it won't work for the common cold.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun. Use sunblock or cover up.
Take your dose at least 1 hour before or 2 hours after meals, milk, or multivitamins with minerals.
Take your dose with a full glass of water and don't lay down right after taking it to prevent throat irritation.
Can cause nausea, vomiting, belly cramping, and diarrhea.

basics.benefits_moa: Tetracycline is an antibiotic. It prevents bacteria from growing, reproducing, and repairing themselves. It also changes your immune system response (immunomodulating effect), which helps treat skin conditions.
basics.bottom_line: Tetracycline treats many different types of infections and is cheap, but dosing and drug interactions may be somewhat of a hassle.
downsides: For most infections you'll need to take it 4 times a day (or every 6 hours).
It needs to be spaced out from food, milk, vitamins, and some medications.
Can cause tongue darkening, heartburn, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
Tetracycline makes your skin more sensitive to the sun and ultraviolet light. Wear sunblock and protective clothing, and don't go tanning.
Interacts with birth control and makes it less effective. Use a backup form of birth control if you don't want to get pregnant.
Not a good choice for children ages 8 and under. Tetracycline can cause permanent staining of teeth in babies and young children.

downsides_processed.orig: For most infections you'll need to take it 4 times a day (or every 6 hours).
It needs to be spaced out from food, milk, vitamins, and some medications.
Can cause tongue darkening, heartburn, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
Tetracycline makes your skin more sensitive to the sun and ultraviolet light. Wear sunblock and protective clothing, and don't go tanning.
Interacts with birth control and makes it less effective. Use a backup form of birth control if you don't want to get pregnant.
Not a good choice for children ages 8 and under. Tetracycline can cause permanent staining of teeth in babies and young children.

upsides: Effectively treats a wide range of conditions and is used for many different types of infections.
Effective for acne.
Cheap.
Good choice for people on kidney dialysis who need an antibiotic. Tetracycline isn't removed by dialysis, so the dose doesn't need to be changed.

upsides_processed.orig: Effectively treats a wide range of conditions and is used for many different types of infections.
Effective for acne.
Cheap.
Good choice for people on kidney dialysis who need an antibiotic. Tetracycline isn't removed by dialysis, so the dose doesn't need to be changed.

userStories.tip: Never EVER take before laying down and ALWAYS with a full glass of water. You do not want to get an esophageal ulcer.
Take it when you get up, so it waits an hour before breakfast.
I stopped taking it after finding an over the counter cream that was a 10% benzoyl peroxide solution that solved my acne problem the day of.

drugs.name: Tetracycline

carousel_items_processed.orig: You might feel better after a few doses, but you'll need to take all the medicine that was prescribed. Not taking all your medicine can cause the bacteria to get stronger and Tetracycline not to work when you need it again in the future.
It doesn't fight viral infections, so it won't work for the common cold.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun. Use sunblock or cover up.
Take your dose at least 1 hour before or 2 hours after meals, milk, or multivitamins with minerals.
Take your dose with a full glass of water and don't lay down right after taking it to prevent throat irritation.
Can cause nausea, vomiting, belly cramping, and diarrhea.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in teeth
risks_warnings.description: Tetracycline and similar medicines can affect the growth and development of teeth in the fetus, infant and in children younger than 8 years old. Avoid using if you're pregnant, breast-feeding, or in children less than 8 years of age and ask your doctor about other effective medicine choices.

description_processed.orig: Tetracycline and similar medicines can affect the growth and development of teeth in the fetus, infant and in children younger than 8 years old. Avoid using if you're pregnant, breast-feeding, or in children less than 8 years of age and ask your doctor about other effective medicine choices.

risks_warnings.title: Reduced effectiveness of birth control pills
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Tetracycline and also on birth control pills, the birth control might not work. You'll need to use a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Tetracycline if you don't want to get pregnant.

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Tetracycline and also on birth control pills, the birth control might not work. You'll need to use a barrier form of birth control (condoms, diaphragms, etc.) while taking Tetracycline if you don't want to get pregnant.

risks_warnings.title: Decreased kidney function and kidney injury
risks_warnings.description: Tetracycline can lower your kidney function causing buildup of substances that should be removed from the body. There's a higher risk if you have current problems with your kidneys. It's also important that you don't take Tetracycline past the expiration date on your prescription label. This was more of a problem with older forms of the medicine, which could change and damage your kidneys.
risk_factors: Taking Tetracycline past the expiration date

description_processed.orig: Tetracycline can lower your kidney function causing buildup of substances that should be removed from the body. There's a higher risk if you have current problems with your kidneys. It's also important that you don't take Tetracycline past the expiration date on your prescription label. This was more of a problem with older forms of the medicine, which could change and damage your kidneys.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking Tetracycline and have to be outside in the sun for any amount of time, make sure you wear sunblock on exposed parts of your body or protective clothing. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and you're at a higher risk for sunburn.
risk_factors: Exposure to sunlight or ultraviolet light

description_processed.orig: If you're taking Tetracycline and have to be outside in the sun for any amount of time, make sure you wear sunblock on exposed parts of your body or protective clothing. Your skin can be more sensitive to the sun and you're at a higher risk for sunburn.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: You should avoid taking Tetracycline if you think you may get pregnant. Tetracycline can affect tooth and bone formation in the developing fetus and infant. The risk is greater the longer you take it, but can happen even with repeated short treatments. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor first about safer medicine choices to treat your condition.

description_processed.orig: You should avoid taking Tetracycline if you think you may get pregnant. Tetracycline can affect tooth and bone formation in the developing fetus and infant. The risk is greater the longer you take it, but can happen even with repeated short treatments. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor first about safer medicine choices to treat your condition.

risks_warnings.title: Increased pressure in the brain
risks_warnings.description: Tetracycline may cause increased pressure in the brain, called pseudotumor cerebri in infants and adults. There's more risk if you also take the drug Accutane. If you notice symptoms of nausea, vomiting, or pounding headache stop taking it and your symptoms should improve. Your doctor can check for changes in your eyes (optic disc swelling) before having you continue treatment.
risk_factors: Taking with Tetracycline with other medicines that can cause this effect (e.g. Accutane)

description_processed.orig: Tetracycline may cause increased pressure in the brain, called pseudotumor cerebri in infants and adults. There's more risk if you also take the drug Accutane. If you notice symptoms of nausea, vomiting, or pounding headache stop taking it and your symptoms should improve. Your doctor can check for changes in your eyes (optic disc swelling) before having you continue treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Liver injury
risks_warnings.description: Liver injury can happen rarely with Tetracycline. There's a higher risk if you have kidney disease. Your doctor should check your liver function before starting you on Tetracycline.

description_processed.orig: Liver injury can happen rarely with Tetracycline. There's a higher risk if you have kidney disease. Your doctor should check your liver function before starting you on Tetracycline.

risks_warnings.title: Development of more serious infections
risks_warnings.description: Using Tetracycline for a long period of time can cause a fungal infection or more serious bacterial infection including c-difficile diarrhea and severe colitis.  It can happen more than 2 months after stopping treatment. If you develop significant diarrhea while taking Tetracycline or after stopping it, let you doctor know right away.

description_processed.orig: Using Tetracycline for a long period of time can cause a fungal infection or more serious bacterial infection including c-difficile diarrhea and severe colitis.  It can happen more than 2 months after stopping treatment. If you develop significant diarrhea while taking Tetracycline or after stopping it, let you doctor know right away.

Call your doctor immediately if you have pain in your abdomen, yellowing of the skin or whites of the eyes, have dark urine, or light colored stool. All of these can be signs of changes to your liver.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea from a superinfection
risks_warnings.description: Taking antibiotics, like Nitrofurantoin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. This is a superinfection, an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: Taking antibiotics, like Nitrofurantoin can increase your chance of getting certain fungal or bacterial infections that causes diarrhea and can be contagious. This is a superinfection, an infection that happens after, or in addition to, an earlier infection. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor since this can be a rare but serious side effect.

carousel_items: Take this medication exactly how your doctor tells you to.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Drink plenty of liquids when taking the medication.
Can cause diarrhea, nausea or vomiting.
Can cause rash.

basics.benefits_moa: Bactrim is a combination antibiotic that contains sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. It kills bacteria by preventing them from making proteins and other chemicals that keep them alive.
basics.bottom_line: Bactrim is good for treating many bacterial infections and is available as a generic. However, you can be more likely to sunburn. Also, it can cause birth defects, so talk to your doctor if you're pregnant.
downsides: Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of liquids.
May cause birth defects.

downsides_processed.orig: Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of liquids.
May cause birth defects.

upsides: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see if Bactrim responds to your infection.

userStories.tip: Take probiotics along with this as it upsets the stomach. Also, I find taking it first thing in the morning and just right before bed the best.
I broke the pill in half to take it. It made it easier  to swallow. Definitely stay out of the sun.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: Bactrim put me in a state of constant anxiety after the very first dose. After two days, I refused to take anymore of it.

drugs.name: Bactrim

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take this medication exactly how your doctor tells you to.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Drink plenty of liquids when taking the medication.
Can cause diarrhea, nausea or vomiting.
Can cause rash.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea
risks_warnings.description: As with all antibiotics, Bactrim can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: As with all antibiotics, Bactrim can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Bactrim. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

description_processed.orig: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Bactrim. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: If you are pregnant, talk to your doctor about alternatives as Bactrim may damage the fetus.

description_processed.orig: If you are pregnant, talk to your doctor about alternatives as Bactrim may damage the fetus.
